mapper.sql: id as id, distribution_pattern_name as distributionPatternName, distribution_pattern_code as distributionPatternCode, rule as rule, rule_sql as ruleSql, ou_id as ouId, picking_mode as pickingMode, priority as priority, is_need_outbound_carton as isNeedOutboundCarton, description as description, create_time as createTime, last_modify_time as lastModifyTime, created_id as createdId, modified_id as modifiedId, lifecycle as lifecycle
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_wh_distribution_pattern_rule ( id, distribution_pattern_name , distribution_pattern_code , rule , rule_sql , ou_id , picking_mode , priority , is_need_outbound_carton , description , create_time , last_modify_time , created_id , modified_id , lifecycle ) VALUES ( #{id,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{distributionPatternName,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{distributionPatternCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{rule,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{ruleSql,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} , #{ouId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{pickingMode,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{priority,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{isNeedOutboundCarton,javaType=java.lang.Boolean,jdbcType=BIT} , #{description,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{createTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{lastModifyTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{createdId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{modifiedId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{lifecycle,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_wh_distribution_pattern_rule SET distribution_pattern_name = #{distributionPatternName,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , distribution_pattern_code = #{distributionPatternCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , rule = #{rule,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , rule_sql = #{ruleSql,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} , ou_id = #{ouId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , picking_mode = #{pickingMode,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , priority = #{priority,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , is_need_outbound_carton = #{isNeedOutboundCarton,javaType=java.lang.Boolean,jdbcType=BIT} , description = #{description,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , create_time = #{createTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , created_id = #{createdId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , modified_id = #{modifiedId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , lifecycle = #{lifecycle,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} WHERE id = #{id}
